Name: Teraphobia: The Beginning Of Beelzebub
About the game: Welcome to Teraphobia: The Beginning Of Beelzebub designed by the only Brothers in the world diagnosed with the Mills Syndrome which has been named after the quadrilogy of Brothers Join our official discord! Get in touch with developers and report bugs and suggest features! see ya there! 1-6 player PVE Single player PVE Teraphobia ... the fear of monsters itself. It’s gotten so bad at this point that you always feel the stress. It’s like someone is watching you constantly... Teraphobia is a psychological co-op horror game where you stop a group of monsters that have awoken from the underworld. Stop the horrifying creatures from hell and don’t get caught. In the darkness lurks the creatures that have been morphed by a retired demi god. The monsters have been freed Into the outer world and it is up to you to stop them. . Replayability : Go into the same map with the same players, with Collectables and AI always changing, no one game is the same from the last! . Immersive : Get really into the zone with ambient noise! Different jump scares to get you really deep into the game . Investigate : I nvestigate the horrors unleashed, find the evidence and escape, but be careful you are not alone! watch your backs!
Publishers: Tombstone Games,( CharzXD, Alanz, Wolfie_Pawz, Vallexian, Willmato )
